item.title: 🐻 BERA: Step By Step Guide
item.description: 💡 Troubleshooting Notes: Custom RPCs can be created here to make UX better as there is a lot of traffic on the network If you get an error when trying to swap or claim, avoid using the “max” shortcut and instead type in an amount using whole numbers or a max of 2 decimal places h/t aibra Phase 1: Collecting Native Currencies 1. Get funds on the network Main Faucet (.
